## Flash Counts
  
Just a reminder - flashes are the events that could not be identified as anything else. Some were indeed flashes (iridium flares or cosmic rays, or perhaps head on meteors . or similar).

```{r echo = FALSE, out.width='100%'}

library(knitr)
File_In <<- (paste(params$Data_Folder,params$Rpt_Month," ",params$Rpt_Year,"/","Chart_Category_Bar_",params$Rpt_Year,"_YTD__Flash.jpg",sep=""))

knitr::include_graphics(File_In)
```
